abstract.original_text: This article presents an overview of the most important respiratory viruses, with the exception of influenza virus, covered in a separate article. This overview includes a description of the agents, their epidemiology, pathogenesis, clinical features, and management and control. The viruses covered are respiratory syncytial virus, parainfluenza viruses, metapneumovirus, and coronaviruses, including the agents of SARS, respiratory adenoviruses, rhinovirus, and bocavirus.
